name: DINO-SORT (Dino Jam 2)
description:
Dino-Sort is a fast-paced sorting puzzle game and was created for Dino Jam 2 by Brandon Leon Channel, solo developer at Bitty Big Studio.

Help Dino, a lil' dinosaur, sort all of the pieces coming down the conveyor belt into trucks to ship off to customers. But be careful! Sending out trucks speeds up the production line, and losing too many pieces causes the volcano to erupt!

Can you get a highscore?

Follow Me on Twitter
